languages.text: "Странное поведение губернатора. Чрезмерно дорогие подарки, смена характера... и все это — накануне нашего прибытия".
languages.translation_comment: привязать каунтер FW_CorruptionClues к куям о кулоне в FW_Entry_dialogue

traits.locale_text: "Сапфирионовый кулон Лидзи. Чересчур дорогой подарок для обычной служанки".

languages.translation_comment: привязать каунтер FW_CorruptionClues к куям о кулоне в FW_Entry_dialogue

languages.text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."
languages.original_text: "Странное поведение губернатора. Чрезмерно дорогие подарки, смена характера... и все это — накануне нашего прибытия".

traits.locale_text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that shortly before our arrival."
"The governor's strange behaviour. The lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that shortly before our arrival."
"The governor's strange behaviour. The lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just moments before our arrival."
"The governor's strange behaviour. The lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just moments before our arrival."
"The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."
"The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."

languages.text: "Das merkwürdige Verhalten des Gouverneurs. Die erstaunlich großzügigen Geschenke, die plötzlichen Veränderungen der Persönlichkeit ... und all das kurz vor unserer Ankunft."
languages.original_text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."

traits.locale_text: "Das merkwürdige Verhalten des Gouverneurs. Die erstaunlich großzügigen Geschenke, die plötzlichen Veränderungen der Persönlichkeit ... und all das kurz vor unserer Ankunft."

languages.text: « Le comportement étrange du gouverneur. Les cadeaux remarquablement somptueux, son changement de personnalité... et tout cela, juste avant notre arrivée. »
languages.original_text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."

traits.locale_text: « Le comportement étrange du gouverneur. Les cadeaux remarquablement somptueux, son changement de personnalité... et tout cela, juste avant notre arrivée. »

languages.text: 「総督の奇妙な振る舞い。やけに豪華な贈り物、性格の変化…しかもそれがすべて、{mf|俺|私}たちの到着直前に起こっている」
languages.original_text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."

traits.locale_text: 「総督の奇妙な振る舞い。やけに豪華な贈り物、性格の変化…しかもそれがすべて、{mf|俺|私}たちの到着直前に起こっている」

languages.text: «El comportamiento extraño del gobernador. Los regalos, sorprendentemente opulentos. Su cambio de personalidad... y todo justo antes de nuestra llegada».
languages.original_text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."

traits.locale_text: «El comportamiento extraño del gobernador. Los regalos, sorprendentemente opulentos. Su cambio de personalidad... y todo justo antes de nuestra llegada».

languages.text: “总督的古怪行为很可疑。他突然送给那位女官奢侈的礼物，性格也发生了变化……这一切刚好发生在我们抵达这里之前。”
languages.original_text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."

traits.locale_text: “总督的古怪行为很可疑。他突然送给那位女官奢侈的礼物，性格也发生了变化……这一切刚好发生在我们抵达这里之前。”

languages.text: "Valinin tuhaf hâlleri mesela. Aşırı cömert hediyeler, bambaşka birine dönüşmesi... Hepsi de bizim gelişimize denk geldi."
languages.original_text: "The governor's strange behaviour. The remarkably lavish gifts, the change in personality... and all of that just before our arrival."

traits.locale_text: "Valinin tuhaf hâlleri mesela. Aşırı cömert hediyeler, bambaşka birine dönüşmesi... Hepsi de bizim gelişimizegeldi."
